ISSUE.TITLE: Add Documentation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This project could use a lot more documentation. I believe that as a community it's something we can get started on. Describe the ways that you can obtain CGM data, how it goes into the mongo instance, etc. A simple "How to get started" from a clone -> look at data perspective.
